1323200.name: Hurry Up!
1323200.description:
Hurry UP! is a casual game where you can play with your friends and other people. We assure that you will find the war of wizards who have lost their magic powers sweet, funny and equally exciting. To talk a little bit about the game;

Entertaining Mechanics





Wizards with a minor problem: they can no longer use magic... Wouldn't the war of the wizards holding guns be funny? Spinning pipes, turrets with locking on targets, exploding bombs and so on is waiting for you in this entertaining world.

Atmospheric Levels


Hurry Up aims to serve a pleasant gaming experience with numerous maps contains numerous mechanics. Also the maps that will be added with updates are going to take shape with your decisions. You can share your ideas about the game with us developers by joining our steam community. You can also be in direct contact with us by joining our discord channel, you can be one of our lucky beta testers who will get the game for free.

Features


- Play on public servers with other gamers, or open up your own private server and play with a group of friends
- Developing according to user requests
- Hurry UP! have 9 levels
- Hurry UP! have entertaining mechanics
- Hurry UP! have 4 characters
1323200.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 简体中文, 日语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 土耳其语
